name: HOOK
messages: Your hooking attack makes %s stagger and fall
description: 77% AP cost, 66% DMG, Down (2) , STR reduces AP cost

name: INERTIAL SWING
messages: Your momentum causes your weapon to glance off of %s
description: 75% AP cost, 50% DMG, WIDE, Knockback (2), STR (S) reduces AP cost, and amps (C) DMG, melee (4)

name: CHOP
messages: You draw back your arm and release a well placed chop %s
description: Crit!, 120% AP cost, 115% Cut and Stab, DEX (D) reduces action cost and amps (B) damage, melee (2)

name: SMASH
messages: You grip your weapon with two hands and slam it into %s
description: Crit!, 110% AP cost, 125% Bash, 110% Cut and Stab, STR (C) reduces AP cost and amps (C) bash damage, melee (2)

name: UNDERHAND
messages: You lunge forward with all your weight and swing upwards at %s
<npcname> swings upwards with all their weight at %s
description: Crit only, 120% moves, 125% damage, Stun for 1.5 turns, STR (A) dramatically reduces action cost, min melee 1

name: SHOVE
messages: You quickly shove %s out of the way
description: 65% moves, dramatically reduced damage, knockback 2 tiles, stun 1 turn, STR (D) and DEX (E) reduce action cost

name: SHIELDED SHOVE
messages: You quickly shove %s out of the way with your weapon
description: 75% moves, no cut damage, 110% Bash and Stab damage, knockback 2 tiles, STR (B) and DEX (C) reduce action cost, min melee 1

name: TEAR
messages: You stab into %s and rake your blade out
description: Crit only, 110% Cut, 115% Stab, min melee 2
